evidence.text: Person A: Father is digging for compliments. Don't indulge him.

Person A: She is, yes, but we haven't explored her options.
Person A: Oh yes. She understands very well.

Person A: Rub-a-dub, three maids in a tub. And who do you think were there? The butcher, the baker, the candlestick-maker-
Person A: Invigorating, isn't it?
Person B: That explains it! Jim Simpson mentioned he hadn't been on-site since last Friday.

Person B: Your father is a rapist.
Person B: Your father is an evil rapist.
Person A: That's enough. You come in here making vague, laughable accusations! I want you out of our house this instant.
Person B: Tell them what you did to my husband. Tell them what you did.
Person B: You never come back here, you crazy woman.
